name: Mochi·Kumochi
description:
Mochi is just another alpaca in a world full of pink alpacas. But one day, for no apparent reason they start losing their pink color. The doctor gives them a pill, but after a series of nonsense events, they lose it. It's up to them and their friend Kumochi, a sugar cloud, to find this pill and give Mochi their color back.

Controls: W/A/S/DMoveRight clickShootLeft clickSwap charactersSpacebarSpecial abilityEscPause menu
Team:

Mochi·Kumochi is Team Alpaca's first game as a development team.  We hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it (most of the times).
